title: An Act relative to removing criminal penalties for limited psilocybin possession

abstracts.abstract: By Ms. Friedman (by request), a petition (accompanied by bill, Senate, No. 1113) of Timothy Morris,  for legislation to remove criminal penalties for limited psilocybin possession.  The Judiciary.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on The Judiciary
